description: This quest will go over the stuff you need to know right now to stay alive for the next 10 minutes.
In the center of your bar is a /b/number and a square head/b/. This represents your /b/current tempature/b/.
If it is a /7/grey zero/7/, you are at nutrual tempature. /b/You want to stay here/b/.
If it is /9/blue/9/, you are starting to get /9/cold/9/. As you get colder, you /c/gain debuffs/c/ until finaly freezing and /4/taking damage at 100./4/
If it is /6/orange/6/, you are starting to get /6/hot/6/. As you get hoterer, you /c/gain debuffs/c/ until finaly boiling and /4/taking damage at 100./4/
Tempature is based on /b/biome/b/, /b/elevation/b/, and /b/nearby blocks/b/. Armour insulation and waterskins can /6/regulate your tempature/6/.

A /b/diamond on the right/b/ of your hotbar shows /6/roughly how hot or cold your suroundings/6/ are If it has a /b/white outline/b/, its /c/outside of the habitable range/c/ and your /6/body tempature will start changing/6/. Move before you freeze/burn.

A mod called /b/Enhanced AI/b/ makes mobs /6/smarter, and harder to fight/6/. /b/Skeletons/b/ will run when your close, /b/Zombies/b/ make use of /b/Ender Pearls/b/ and /b/Fishing Rods,/b/ and creepers might walk while hissing, or they just leap at you.
/b/Born in Chaos/b/ adds some /6/more difficult mobs/6/ that come out at night. It might be best that you stay inside for your first few nights.
